createMatchbox(bytes32).details: Uses EIP-1167 minimal proxy pattern with CREATE2 for deterministic addresses

params.salt: A unique salt for CREATE2 (allows users to have multiple Matchboxes)

returns.matchbox: The address of the newly created Matchbox

params.limit: The number of items to return

IMPLEMENTATION().notice: The implementation contract for minimal proxies

constructor.notice: Initializes the MatchboxFactory and deploys the implementation contract

createMatchbox(bytes32).notice: Creates a new Matchbox vault for the caller

getAllMatchboxes(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets a paginated list of all Matchboxes

getMatchboxesForOwner(address).notice: Gets all Matchboxes for a specific owner

getTotalMatchboxes().notice: Gets the total number of deployed Matchboxes

isMatchbox(address).notice: Mapping to check if an address is a Matchbox

ownerToMatchboxes(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from owner to their Matchbox addresses

predictMatchboxAddress(address,bytes32).notice: Predicts the address of a Matchbox before deployment
